\w And|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: See thou \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*: \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tails|strong="H2180"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* fire brands, \w smoking|strong="H6226"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* fury \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Rasin king \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Romelia.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* hath taken \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee, unto \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Romelia, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w It|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*.
